events.Title: Harry Potter Trivia Night
events.Description: A fun-filled trivia night to test your knowledge of all things Harry Potter!

events.Title: Potterheads Meetup: Wand Duels
events.Description: Meet other Potterheads and duel it out with your wands in this exciting event!

events.Title: Muggle Studies: How to Survive Hogwarts
events.Description: Join us for a lecture on how to survive your first year at Hogwarts!

events.Title: Clown College Graduation Ceremony
events.Description: It's the grand graduation ceremony of our hilarious clown college. Come laugh with us!
events.Address: Funny Clown Circus, Rue de La Gag

events.Title: The Great Potato Sack Race
events.Description: Join the most exciting potato sack race competition ever. Winner gets a lifetime supply of mashed potatoes!

events.Title: Online Yoga for Lazy People
events.Description: A relaxed yoga session, perfect for people who don't want to move too much.

events.Title: Superhero Costume Party
events.Description: Dress up as your favorite superhero (or villain) for a night of fun and dancing!

events.Title: Pillow Fight Championship
events.Description: A championship to determine the world's greatest pillow fighter. Prepare your pillows!

events.Title: International Ice Cream Tasting
events.Description: Taste the best ice creams from around the world in one event!

events.Title: Alien Abduction Support Group
events.Description: Do you think you've been abducted by aliens? Join others like you in a supportive environment.

events.Title: World's Largest Group Hug
events.Description: A massive event where we all gather to give the biggest group hug ever.

events.Title: Cactus Appreciation Day
events.Description: A day dedicated to appreciating the beauty and resilience of cacti. Bring your favorite cactus!

events.Title: Cheese Festival: The Big Cheese-Off
events.Description: The biggest cheese festival with tastings, contests, and more. Let's get cheesy!

events.Title: The Great Pancake Flipping Contest
events.Description: Compete in the most epic pancake-flipping contest of all time. Flip your way to victory!
